scripts.release-android: cd android; ./gradlew clean; ./gradlew assembleRelease && echo 'APK is at android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk'; cd ..; open android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/ 2> /dev/null; # generate; print location; open location;
scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all; rm -f yarn.lock; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; cd ios; rm -rf Podfile.lock; pod deintegrate; pod repo update; pod install; cd ..; yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && git clean -f android > /dev/null && echo 'Removed drawable assets' # generate bundle; Remove extra assets;
scripts.reload-android: adb shell am force-stop com.rntemplate && adb shell am start com.rntemplate/com.rntemplate.MainActivity
scripts.emulator-android: first_avd=$(emulator -list-avds | tail -n 1) && emulator -avd $first_avd # one shot turn on android emulator, run android used to be enough before Android Studio v. Koala
